text: Like any other website and product, Arrowhead uses 'cookies'.

We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: * Provide, operate, and maintain our website and product * Improve, personalize, and expand our website and product * Understand and analyze how you use our website and product * Develop new products, services, features, and functionality * Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website and product, and for marketing and promotional purposes * Send you emails

They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Arrowhead, which are sent directly to users' browser.
